snippet: This long-awaited move should save thousands of lives and potentially billions of dollars in medical and economic costs a year.
abstract: Editorial welcomes Food and Drug Administration's push to ban virtually all artificial trans fats from the American food supply; holds measure is long-overdue and could save thousands of lives and potentially billions of dollars in medical and economic costs per year.
lead_paragraph: This long-awaited move should save thousands of lives and potentially billions of dollars in medical and economic costs a year.

headline.main: An Overdue Ban on Trans Fats
headline.print_headline: An Overdue Ban on Trans Fats
